content: (originally posted to clinFHIR, posting here per recommendation from David Hay)

In our EHR, Condition currently only returns problem list entries. We are building in an interface for pulling out Past Medical History (a.k.a. Medical History). Are there any existing Condition category codes we should use? Or should we just make up our own? We didn't find any categories that seemed to indicated Past Medical History. Thanks.

(David's comment) well the binding is example strength so you can use what you want to - thought whether this is the best property for indicating PMH is debatable - would clinicalStatus be an alternative option for something that is no longer active? Might be a good question for the implementers list...
this is harder than it sounds. You should read http://build.fhir.org/lifecycle.html#current
the EHR vendors have declined to follow this advice as unnecessary complexity. It makes any other use case harder though
